summary: The diff does not provide evidence that the REQ-12 admin-only build/deploy metadata update method (and related behavior) was implemented in backend/main.mo. Additionally, project_state.json was modified even though the request was strictly about backend behavior and imposed constraints around frontend-only files (not mentioning project_state.json).

missing_requirements.requirement: backend/main.mo exposes a new shared admin-only method that updates canisterBuildMetadata (commitHash, buildTime, dfxVersion), traps with an English "Unauthorized" message for non-admins, and preserves getCanisterBuildMetadata as a public query returning sensible defaults with no candid/type mismatch for existing frontend query useGetCanisterBuildMetadata.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided backend/main.mo diff snippet is truncated and contains only imports/type definitions; it does not show any new shared update method, authorization check/trap message, canisterBuildMetadata storage, or getCanisterBuildMetadata behavior/return defaults. Therefore the requirement cannot be verified as implemented from the diff evidence.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated; no visible metadata methods or access checks)

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project state/feature documentation content in project_state.json (schemaVersion/projectStateVersion/feature descriptions).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-12 is specifically about adding an admin-only backend method and preserving an existing public query without candid mismatches. No requirement requests updating project_state.json or adding/changing documentation there.
